Articles.Content:
Some early Russian missiles for your extra BDA weapons, including:

AA-2 (USSR P-3c missile), AA-4, and two Pitot tubes (it make your jet more like a jet)

if you dislike USSR weapons, you could give this missile to your AI enemies;

if you like them, enjoy it!

 

https://spacedock.info/mod/1556/Maimico‘s Military part Pack

License: MIT

Sorry for my broken English.

In most situations I'd use an extendable pole antenna for my Pitot tube requirements, but this looks a bit better.

Might be a promising BDA extension anyway and looking forward to more new items.
Look forward to more Russian and Chinese parts.Hope you success
